name: WP DLM FAQ
author: DLM

sections.description:
An easy way to add a faq on one of your pages becomes reality thanks to this WordPress plugin. Just use the shortcode [inject-faq] on any of your pages. This will automatically generate a faq section of all your pages and posts.

How to uninstall WP DLM FAQ

To uninstall WP DLM FAQ, you just have to de-activate the plugin from the plugins list.

short_description: Add a faq on any of your page/post using the simple shortcode [inject-faq].
description:
An easy way to add a faq on one of your pages becomes reality thanks to this WordPress plugin. Just use the shortcode [inject-faq] on any of your pages. This will automatically generate a faq section of all your pages and posts.

How to uninstall WP DLM FAQ

To uninstall WP DLM FAQ, you just have to de-activate the plugin from the plugins list.

upgrade_notice.1.4: • add bullets to the new line in asnwers
upgrade_notice.1.3: • refine the code to remove the see all button if there is less than 10 questions on a page
upgrade_notice.1.2: • refine the code to eliminate extra special chars
upgrade_notice.1.1: Upgrade if you want to have a read more link in the list page as you do not want to have all the faq display at once.
